item.title: About me
item.description: Hello, I’m Marcela Güiza, I’m an experienced Android developer. I have been working with Android native applications for more than five years, and now I can say those years have been wonderful and very challenging time for me. I had the opportunity to know about mobile development and to get involved in Android platform, and now I want to continue learning new things and having new challenges in this world.

item.title: Experience
item.description:
ANDROID DEVELOPER July 2017 – Currently Blanc Labs I am working in the construction and development of Android native applications using Kotlin most of the time. Also, I am working with gRPC, RxJava, Material Design, Git, Java, XML, WebServices, Gradle, Unit testing, dependency injection, Data-binding, Architecture MVVM, Android Architecture Components (Live Data and ViewModel) and Android libraries.
ANDROID DEVELOPER October 2015 – July 2017 Tappsi Here in Tappsi I was working in the construction and development of Android native applications.

item.title: Portofolio
item.description: Applications below are part of the portfolio in which I have worked: Nekso Passenger & Nekso Driver Nekso is a transportation ecosystem that connects passengers to a network of taxi companies. Tappsi Driver & Tappsi Passenger Tappsi is the Colombian app to connect a passenger with a driver, also allows to share the taxi license plates via email, social networks or SMS/iMessage. weHive A social network dedicated to connecting artists and fans during live music events, gigs and festivals
